label: Address
comment: The location at which a particular trade related organization or person may be found or reached.

datatypeProperties.comment: The additional name of a street, expressed as text, for this trade address.
A code specifying the type of this trade address, such as business address or home address.
The name, expressed as text, of a person or department in the organization to whom incoming mail is marked with words such as 'for the attention of' or 'FAO' or 'ATTN' for this trade address.
The name, expressed as text, of a building, a house or other structure on a street at this trade address.
The building number, expressed as text, in this trade address.
The name, expressed as text, of a person or organization at this trade address to whom incoming mail is marked with words such as 'care of' or 'C/O'.
The identifier of the city for this trade address, such as United Nations Location Code (UNLOCODE).
The name, expressed as text, of the city, town or village of this birth address.
A name, expressed as text, of a sub-division of a city for this trade address, for example a district or borough.
A name, expressed as text, of the country for this trade address.
A unique identifier of the country sub-division for this trade address.
A name, expressed as text, of the sub-division of a country for this trade address.
The name, expressed as text, of a department for this trade address.
A textual description for the type of transportation waste recovery disposal process.
A free form representation, expressed as text, of this trade address.
A proprietary identifier.
The indication of whether or not this trade address is invalid.
The fifth free form line, expressed as text, of this financial institution address.
The fourth free form line, expressed as text, of this financial institution address.
The first free form line, expressed as text, of this financial institution address.
The third free form line, expressed as text, of this financial institution address.
The second free form line, expressed as text, of this financial institution address.
The post office box, expressed as text, for this financial institution address.
A code specifying the postcode of this trade address.
A name, expressed as text, of a street or thoroughfare for this trade address.

objectProperties.comment: An identification of a set of geographical coordinates for this trade address.

referencedBy.comment: A postal address for this legally set up organization.
A postal address for this legally set up organization.
A address specified for this location.
